name: Just Another Pacman Game
description:
The name says it all! It's just another pacman game!

Okay, that's a slight lie, well, not really. It's just a bad version of pacman except the window moves around and stuff. So yeah, download it, and then go and say nice thing in the comments, thanks :D

Honistly though. This game was written for the Game Dev League Pacman Jam and was written in 48 hours. Enjoy what happens when someone who knows no C decides to write a game in it

Controlls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • 'C' to insert a coin
  • Alt+F4 to quit
